DOC.brief_summary: A study of non-inferiority design comparing brilliant blue and indocyanine green as intraoperative dye in macular pucker and macular hole.
DOC.criteria: age over 50 macular pucker or macular hole with subjective disturbances All phakic or pseudophakic patients far visual acuity better than 20/400 able to read, understand, and willing to sign the informed consent form any other ocular disease or conditions compromising the visual acuity other than macular hole or macular pucker prior vitreoretinal surgery in the study eye
